phrases: Yes, his eldest son inherited his title.
I have heard that he is intensely loyal to the emperor.
Those who have not yet submitted to me are essentially loyalists.
If we can sway him over to our camp,
it would be possible to get them all to change sides at once.
The question, though, is whether he is a man who can be trusted.
We will now leave the atmosphere and make for the Satellite Belt.
Our staging area is Parnassos Base!
Our attack target is the enemy's moonbase.
It is the main enemy fortress where Princess Asseylum is.
Given that the Landing Castle in the sector we are approaching
is likely to serve as a shelter for Princess Asseylum in the event of an attack,
it will be necessary to attack these two fortifications simultaneously.
Therefore, we will be splitting our forces into two for this operation.
Breton Company and the Deucalion will, at 2200 hours Earth Standard Time,
commence their attack against the Landing Castle.
After we have confirmation that the enemy moonbase's forces
have split off to defend the Landing Castle,
Trakehner Company will make use of the asteroids that litter the area.
They will conceal their approach of the enemy base and then strike!
This operation is designated Operation Luna Gate.
If I had not been so careless...
No, any blame must rest with me.
This entire situation began with me.
Do not say such things, Milady...
If you had remained asleep, everything would have gone smoothly.
And he would not have been corrupted...
You care deeply for Slaine, do not you?
My heart belongs to the world of Vers and the people who dwell there.
That is what I was taught and how I have lived my life.
We will attack the Landing Castle along with Breton Company.
We are responsible for half of this two-front operation,
the second being the attack on the moonbase.
That is the mission we have been given by headquarters.
Basically, we are just here to get the enemy to divide his forces.
By using this ship as bait again...
However, I have no intention of accepting that role lying down.
People, do not throw your lives away,
and until we return to Earth,
I want you to do your best.
All hands to your assigned stations!
I had a feeling you would speak with me.
I have something to discuss with you, too.
As I understand it, you have come all this way
to offer your condolences over my father, Count Saazbaum.
We are quite a long way from Vers, after all.
That, as well as congratulations for your succession,
No, it is I who must apologize
for failing to congratulate you on your own succession to the peerage, Count Cruhteo.
I am still unaccustomed to the title.
Princess Asseylum was looking forward to seeing you again after so long, but...
I hear that she has been feeling unwell.
It is nothing serious, but one cannot be too careful.
I am most indebted to your late father.
He was not hard on you?
He was a man who was stern to a fault.
I learned a great many lessons from him.
I would not be the man I am today were it not for him.
I am glad that it appears to be of some use to you, Lord Troyard.
I heard while en route here.
Something to the effect that you were going to found a new kingdom here?
It is my understanding that he is not well.
Our top medical staff are tending to him with our latest medical equipment.
There is no because for concern.
I am sure that when Princess Asseylum's wish comes true,
His Majesty will also be overjoyed.
If you were to lend us your support, Lord Klancain,
To seeing this new kingdom alter Vers' future.
Examination of rock clusters exhibiting unnatural behavior
suggests objects of different mass behind them.
See Count Klancain to a safe location.
Enemy force will be in firing range in 7 minutes.
We will gradually move the line back as we engage them
and separate the enemy force from the moonbase.
Clydesdale Platoon, move to launch position.
And now Mustang Platoon, prepare for launch.
Breton Company and Deucalion, begin attack as planned.
Multiple enemy contacts detected in the direction of Libra.
Enemy defenses are pretty tough, all right...
They knew that this was going to be a tough fight.
The reason it was necessary to push ahead with this operation in spite of that...
The captain was right to be suspicious.
That is a covert infiltration by an assault team during an all-out offensive...
No, there would be no need for secrecy then.
Let us stick to the plan, then.
I had wanted to come alone.
It is going to be dangerous from here on.
You are giving me that again?
The captain assigned me to provide support
out of recognition for my accomplishments.
For the fact that I have been fighting alongside you and the others.
I will make the drop from here.
You cannot return fire like this!
I can dodge it from this range.
It is safe to drop me, Inko.
Each team will search their assigned route.
When the target is spotted, carry out mission immediately.
I was also expecting an infiltration team.
It is likely that the enemy has also infiltrated other zones.
Being relocated to a more secure block.
Your servant Barouhcruz has rushed over to provide assistance!!
I will also send Harklight to your location.
What in the world is happening?
I will hold them off here.
The rest of you, locate the target!
Importing base security feeds and generating map.
I am using you too much, huh?
If I follow their path of advance... that is where Seylum will be.
The enemy is as good as wiped
Ultra high-tension monofilament wire spooled around
There is nothing that this blade cannot cut through!
You see to the rats in the area,
Milord Slaine, we have lost contact with the escorts!
Making for the landing port, but enemy forces are heading there as well!
I do not need a reason to save someone.
The suffering of those you save never enters your mind, does it?
I am certain we can find safety
This place is my only shelter.
I did not expect to see you here, Inaho Kaizuka.
Calculate firing point from bullet path.
She is a means to achieving my ends.
You are going to exploit her?
If she is, do you have a problem with that?!
You were an enemy all along!
If that is all you were, there would have been no need to hate you.
Seylum... I am glad... you are okay.
Princess Asseylum Vers Allusia, identity confirmed.
Temporarily assuming control over Inaho Kaizuka's
thought processes, awareness, and speech functions.
Even though this boy is aware that Princess Asseylum is a separate individual,
he misidentifies her as a part of himself.
He therefore placed maximum priority on her safety and has acted to protect her.
Will provide information in accordance with those behavioral principles.
Use communications line inside F3 gate airlock
The crew of the Deucalion... they are here?!
I know where that airlock is.
But we cannot leave Inaho here
There is no because for concern.
Then we should hurry all the more.
There is no telling if that help is on our side.
Please tell him something for me.
Thank you from the bottom of my heart.
I also think of you as a part of myself.
Just a moment, I will get the transmission
We last met at my father's commendation ceremony.
I am honored that you remember me.
